name: Add a new row into a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a new feature in ArcGIS Field Maps
description:
Every time a new feature is created in ArcGIS Field Maps, a new row will be created in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

Note that the template works with a sample Debris map described in [this article.](https://www.esri.com/arcgis-blog/products/field-maps/field-mobility/automate-email-notifications-for-field-updates/)

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TjvGslZxiwp1W4aOyWTa3pZhO-_n9b-qfic2S4xVDzo/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the destination for the ArcGIS features. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
